channel.title: 1973 on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in 1973 on Sermon Archives

item.title: Christ - Fulfillment of Promise
item.description: Here is a handwritten sermon from the first Sunday after Christmas in 1973. It seems rather festive, since the sermon is written in black, red, and green ink.

item.title: Where Does Wholeness Begin?
item.description: Typed sermon from 1973. Originally listed as a “Trinity XV” sermon, but that was crossed out, likely due to the changes in lectionary since the 1970s.
